speakers.name: Dr. Amina J. Mohammed
speakers.title: Deputy Secretary-General
speakers.bio: Dr. Amina J. Mohammed is the Deputy Secretary-General of the United Nations and Chair of the United Nations Sustainable Development Group.

speakers.name: Christine Lagarde
speakers.title: President
speakers.bio: Christine Lagarde is the President of the European Central Bank and former Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund.

speakers.name: Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala
speakers.title: Director-General
speakers.bio: Dr. Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala is the Director-General of the World Trade Organization and former Finance Minister of Nigeria.

speakers.name: Jacinda Ardern
speakers.title: Former Prime Minister
speakers.bio: Jacinda Ardern is the former Prime Minister of New Zealand, known for her compassionate leadership and focus on well-being.

speakers.name: Ursula von der Leyen
speakers.title: President
speakers.bio: Ursula von der Leyen is the President of the European Commission and former German Defense Minister.

speakers.name: Mia Mottley
speakers.title: Prime Minister
speakers.bio: Mia Mottley is the Prime Minister of Barbados and a prominent voice on climate change and sustainable development.
